alert.note: Alert for Dougherty; Tift; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 5:28PM EDT until August 08 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Tift County in south central Georgia... Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Albany, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sylvester, Tifton, Albany, Putney, Omega, Poulan, Ty Ty, Unionville, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Phillipsburg, Terrell, Sumner, Bridgeboro, Minton, Eldorado, Scooterville, Radium Springs and Lockett Crossing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
